main_definition: Better protected from harm or danger.

meanings_and_examples.definition: More secure than before; less risky
meanings_and_examples.example: Installing a security system makes your home safer.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Related to safety or not causing harm
meanings_and_examples.example: Safer driving habits, like using turn signals and obeying speed limits.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Protection from a specific type of danger
meanings_and_examples.example: Wearing a helmet is safer when riding a bicycle.
